Interface IApplicationModule

Represents a module in the application.

Namespace: Hexalith.Application.Modules.Modules
Assembly: Hexalith.Application.Modules.Abstractions.dll
Syntax
public interface IApplicationModule
Remarks

A module is a self-contained unit of functionality in the application. It provides a set of actions that can be performed and has a name, description, path, and version.
